name: CupertinoActionSheetAction
desc: The content of a typical action button in a [CupertinoActionSheet].

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: The callback that is called when the button is selected.

fields.name: isDefaultAction
fields.desc: Whether this action is the default choice in the action sheet.

fields.name: isDestructiveAction
fields.desc: Whether this action might change or delete data.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: The cursor that will be shown when hovering over the button.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of CupertinoActionSheetAction
desc: 【isDefaultAction】: Whether it is the default action 【bool】
